resources.string: Set custom actions for S Pen gestures
Enable the mouse icon when using the S Pen
Use custom application instead of the recent applications dialog
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in proper format ie. mm/dd/yy
Select the location where you can bring up PIE
Manage how animations and status additions will be handled
Adjust the gap that separates PIE elements
Determine the size of the triggering area that will start PIE
This will restart your launcher, but may have adverse effects on the screen. Some widgets may not look right either. Be careful.
Always show menu button even when it isn\'t necessary
Enable search button on pie controls
Enable last app button on pie controls
Center Pie on the trigger edge
If checked PIE will stay in place no matter which orientation
Reset circle colors to apply installed theme engine colors
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Whether to show icons or text on your toggles.
Choose how many toggles to show per row
Choose the order which your toggles are displayed
Short press for Settings, Long press for Toggles
Short press for Toggles, Long press for Settings
Reset all toggles and their order
Choose which side the fast toggle area shall be
Delay to use after long pressing the screenshot toggle

In Basic mode, the toggle will cycle through actions on each click. Longpress will launch the displayed action. This is most useful for users who want the toggle to launch applications.\nIn Advanced mode, the toggle allows you to launch an action with each click. Longpress actions will also be available to you in this mode. This is most useful for users who desire a toggle that performs tasks that does not launch a new application.
Will launch state one on boot
Useful for aligning task to displayed icon per your specific usage
Toggle sequence from left to right
Choose between holo light or holo dark
Default JB with invisible icons when hidden
Remember to remove your menu buttons if you\'re using the big menu button!
How and when do you want the menu buttons to appear?
Choose the number of navigation buttons
100 is 70\%% of screen width, 5 is 30\%% of screen width. 0 will default to per button width.
Navigation Bar height while in portrait.
Navigation Bar height while in landscape.
Navigation Bar height if the bar is along a side.
You should reboot right now to make sure everything works properly!
Please reboot for height change to be added properly!
When you press on a button, there is a glow. Use this to change the color of the glow.
Show arrow keys in the navigation bar while typing
Allow to completely hide the Statusbar
Timeout time for Hidden Navbar Window
Press icon to select actions or custom icon
Swipe to view - Click to choose
Do you want to reset the navigation ring?
Choose number of targets in the navigation ring
Drag your finger to targets to assign actions
Show navigation and status bar transparency
Show navigation and status bar transparency
Please enter a new label. Enter an empty label to revert to stock label.
Display number of pending notifications on the status bar
Display the 3-dot overflow menu button within apps
The menu overflow button may not be visible until apps are restarted
The menu overflow button may not be hidden until apps are restarted
Display the name of the currently connected Wifi network on notification drawer
You can remove the wallpaper from the menu in this window
Allows you to slide your finger along the top of the statusbar to change the brightness. Does nothing when autobrightness is enabled.
Wake up device if a charger is plugged/unplugged.
Hide some systembar stuff i.e. the compat mode button
This will Enable/Disable Dual panel view (requires reboot)
Screen will animate an Electron Beam when turned off
Will allow you to read the message your typing while in landscape mode.
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
Note: This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is out. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.

This rambar shows how android is really using your available ram. Please note that having apps open in the background and cached helps for your device to open your apps faster. For further explanations on how android memory (RAM) managment works, please follow the help button in the menu.
Make sure you follow the steps one-by-one and complete each one before proceeding to the next.
1. Change LCD Density to stock value
Tablets and older phones use 160. Most phones use 240. Galaxy Nexus uses 320 by default.
Come back here after the reboot and complete the rest of the steps!
This step clears data from Google play services and Google services framework.
"Data couldn't be cleared, please clear it yourself!"
Come back here after the reboot and complete the rest of the steps!
Press back when done to return here.
"Couldn't open the market! If you're sure it's installed, open it yourself from the launcher."
6. Change density to whatever youd like!
If you ever have compatibility issues with the market, be sure to return here and repeat the process.
"Changing your LCD density can cause unexpected app behavior. If you encounter market app incompatibility, please return here and restart the process from step 1."
Click on the LED to change the color
"Would you like to change the app: "
". Please turn off your screen to see the LED. Don't hit OK on this popup until you're done viewing the LED color."
Enable LED while charging (needs a reboot)
View or change custom quick shortcuts
Drag the slider to targets to assign shortcuts
View or change custom slider shortcuts
Lock screen shortcuts reset to default
Delete all user created lock screen shortcuts and restore to default?
Select or change the desired application or activity and the associated icon
Show widgets maximized and the unlock minimized when the screen is turned on
Set wether the hints for the left and right widgets are shown when the screen is turned on.
Use a carousel animation when switching between lockscreen widgets.
Lockscreen will have ability to rotate via device orientation. This is independent of Auto-rotation in display
Warning** Some widgets are not intended to be used on the lockscreen, The widget developer, Team XY are not responsible for your choice of lockscreen widgets. Choose responsibly.
Warning** Adding too many widgets can cause major lag issues with lockscreen.
This enables your device to be unlocked with the widgets maximised by long pressing the lock icon.
Allows to see the application behind the lock screen.
View or change how the \'cLock\' Home and Lock screen widgets will display
Select the density from a list
Select a custom density from 120 to 480
Define which apps should be in each DPI group
Save your configuration with every change
Remove custom DPI groups and leave the default groups
Do you want to delete this DPI group?
The selected custom dpi group already exists.
This change needs a reboot to be applied. Do you want to reboot now?
